Hi Shonagh,

Thanks for the update, I completely understand your concern.

It’s a bit unusual, because while some customers are experiencing errors, our earlier tests did process successfully. After further checks, we’ve identified that the WooCommerce PayPal Payments gateway is returning the error:PAYEE_NOT_ENABLED_FOR_CARD_PROCESSING
This generally means the PayPal business account isn’t yet enabled for Advanced Credit and Debit Card Payments (the setting that allows customers to pay directly with credit/debit cards).

Could you please log in to your PayPal Business Dashboard and check under:
PayPal Dashboard → Payment Methods → Online Card Payments

There should be an option for Advanced Credit and Debit Card Payments. Please confirm if it is switched ON. If it isn’t, kindly turn it on and let us know.
If the option isn’t available, or if errors continue even after enabling it, we may need to contact PayPal Support to have them activate card processing for your account.

In the meantime, I’ve temporarily disabled the PayPal payment option to prevent further failed orders. Once the account is confirmed to be enabled for card processing, we can re-activate it.

Thanks for checking this, and we’ll work together to get it resolved as quickly as possible.

There is something not right, we've received several more failed orders

I don't understand why this is happening, and it is very unusual. You can see by looking in the back end how many failed orders have been generated.

Shonagh Kelly

Hi Shonagh,

Thank you so much for jumping on a quick screenshare earlier—it really made things clearer and was such a big help!

We’ve gone ahead and updated the PayPal settings. It seems the issue was caused when PayPal was clicked on the product and cart pages, so we’ve turned those off. Customers can now continue right through to checkout without any problems.

Let’s keep an eye on things together over the next little while, but so far everything’s looking good. Really appreciate your help on this!

Hi Shonagh,

Thanks again for your patience while we investigate this.

We ran a series of tests on our side, and everything went through PayPal without issue. To troubleshoot further, we’ve temporarily disabled PayPal on your site so customers can still place orders via Stripe. Could you please try placing an order again now and let me know if it works from your end?

I completely understand how frustrating this is, and we want to get it resolved as quickly as possible. If it’s easier, feel free to give me a call directly on 0480 041 691and I’ll be happy to walk through it with you.
